artist: You, Me, And Everyone We Know
title: Dirty Laundry
lyrics:
All alone again [x2]
I speak as if I'd last one minute
My eyes are fixed upon this screen
Stalking the girls I could never f**k
I mean they're sluts but it seems I lack that luck
And I'm not the man to wash my hands

All alone or acting like we've hit it off

Cuz either way I'm just jerkin someone off

To whip dicks out and pissin'

Till you leave town wishing. NO!!!

I won't be satisfied



[Chorus]



Things are gonna be different now you see

And add to all this dirty laundry you left me

Its' getting air and with heavy rotation

You'd better have a damn good explanation

You act as though you have lived a life

Because you're a tad bit over cooked

But I've been burned and burned

AND BURNED AND BURNED!!!



[Drum solo]



And now every single day,

I look more like my father

I've only got so many layers

And it's only getting hotter

To whip dicks out and pissin'

Till you leave town wishing. NO!!!

I won't be satisfied



[Chorus x2]



I didn't mean to be so forward

There are some things you should know

He loves you like a truck stop screw

When you're alone he adores me

You'd best get it straight say it

When you're all dressed you just bore me [x2]



[Chorus x2]



(Thanks to Maddy for these lyrics)
